title: How to Avoid Marketing Emergencies
body: This is a test of the non emergency marketing system. This is only a test. If this were an actual marketing emergency you would be instructed what to do when to do it and how to do it. There are no marketing emergencies. There are poor marketing methods and systems that cause if left untreated cause money to be wasted on ineffective marketing that leads to emergencies or business failures that could have been avoided.
